Emergency Kit Organizer: Luggage tags can be used to organize and easily identify various items in an emergency kit, allowing first responders to quickly find essentials during an emergency.
Garden Marker: Luggage tags could be embedded in soil and used as garden markers to identify different types of plants.
Luggage Lock: Travelers can use a luggage tag as a temporary lock to secure the zippers of their bags while waiting to check them in, preventing unauthorized handling.
Gift Tag: Luggage tags can be repurposed as a unique and stylish gift tag for presents.
Magnetic Tool Holder: A luggage tag with a magnetic back can be used to hold small tools and accessories in a garage or workshop, freeing up counter and shelf space.
